vivek tewary

PhD Student
Mathematics Department
IIT Bombay
Mumbai, India

I am a PhD Student in the Mathematics Department of IIT Bombay under the guidance of Professor Sivaji Ganesh Sista.

My research interests are in:

  • Homogenization of Partial Differential Equations.
  • Spectral Theory of periodic operators.
  • Almost periodic operators.

Since January 2016, I am also one of the system administrators at the Mathematics Department, IIT Bombay. Other than computers, also handy with analysis and PDEs.

Email: vivekt@iitb.ac.in
